string.text: Please help!!! ... anyone who can receive this .... we are trapped at the Factory ... the Military have us surrounded ... outnumbered, and out-gunned .... we need some help .... NOW!!!
I'm trapped in the Courtyard!!! .... help me Brothers!!! ... please ...
I've already given all I can ...

Marked One ... the Military have control here, and are not going to let you just leave. I have let the barkeep know that you have been here ...\nThey are coming with re-enforcements ... by Helicopter. The building is completely surrounded. You must get out of here now!!! Good luck. Get out now!!!!
Strelok, to me worthless news. Fang was lost. You has not found. In vain you one to the center have gone. However, business master's. At whom and where you to search, I know. a phantom.
